plot: Eight comedians battle it out to win viewers' votes and claim the title King of Comedy. They live and work together 24 hours a day, preparing to perform on stage each night in front of an audience in the Kings of Comedy club.
plot_en: Eight comedians battle it out to win viewers' votes and claim the title King of Comedy. They live and work together 24 hours a day, preparing to perform on stage each night in front of an audience in the Kings of Comedy club.
plot_es: Eight comedians battle it out to win viewers' votes and claim the title King of Comedy. They live and work together 24 hours a day, preparing to perform on stage each night in front of an audience in the Kings of Comedy club.
title: Kings of Comedy
